name: Find the Magic
description:
A world full of wizardry and magics awaits you! One small problem though, all the mana is gone! Some jerk stole those magical creatures, and it's your job to find the magic.
My second game I've ever made, and hopefully this one I will finish and release I made all of the assets myself, which includes (but is not limited to): Sprites & other Art assets, Music, Code, 3D Models, etc.
Join my discord server! i post updates on progress and sneak peeks there: https://discord.gg/bsSkjwP

(also since there is nothing in-game that tells you the controls yet, here you go):

A - move left

D - move right

spacebar - jump

mouse - aim

M1 - shoot

escape - pause

enter - confirm/skip dialogue
